subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
A_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders.
A_hi: गृहप्रदेश में उत्पादन के माध्यमिक आधारित अनुमान एक देश के अंतरालों के अनुमान है।
B_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders.
B_hi: गृहप्रदेश के अंतरालों के अनुमान है।
C_en: GDP is the sum of all consumer prices in a country.
C_hi: गृहप्रदेश के विभिज्ञान के अनुमान है।
D_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders, excluding prices.
explanation_en: GDP measures the total value of goods and services produced within a country, without considering prices. It gives an overview of a country's economic activity.
explanation_hi: गृहप्रदेश के अनुमान समानता में गृहप्रदेश के अनुमान है।
